scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Fleetwood
scrape.text: This book is so messed up. Seriously, the dude has issues! He seems so normal when the book starts. I make fun of people who point with their pinky too. I can see where is issues with his brother stem from. But as the book goes on, you start to casually realize how f'd up this guy is! Cray cray! :) I loved it. Quick read too!
